column4: Trying to install xampp-linux-1.7.1.tar.gz, it says "Go to a Linux shell and login as the system administrator root:" When I do that it "su: Authentication failure".
will try
why are you using xamp?
thats because you use apache mysql and php.
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/ApacheMySQLPHP
your mysql server will be open for modification
did you read the ubuntu wiki page i linked to you ?
then keep reading the page

also the proper way to restart apache on karmic is "sudo service apache2 restart|stop|start"
get the same thing but it spits it out three times
how many entries do you have in /etc/apache2/sites-enabled/ ?
one file
did you just copy paste my example verbatim?
| means or. so you stop apache by using : sudo service apache2 stop
yes typed it in terminal
thats why you got a response x3..
